text: Pavel Zavadil (born 30 April 1978 in Olomuc) is a Czech football midfielder, preferably playing on the right wing or in the center of the field just behind the striker. He is currently playing for SFC Opava. He has played for Örgryte IS and Öster. Before that, he played for Mjällby AIF the first time, as well as AC Sparta Prague and a short spell in Israeli football. Winner of EF-trophy 2006, Öster IF's supporter club East Fronts award to the best player of the season. Zavadil has made a name mainly through his free kicks and corner kicks. In 2009 Pavel Zavadil signed a 2-year contract with Örgryte IS. ==External links== * * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech expatriate footballers Category:Maccabi Haifa F.C. players Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Örgryte IS players Category:Östers IF players Category:FC Baník Ostrava players Category:AC Sparta Prague players Category:Aris Thessaloniki F.C. players Category:Czech First League players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Superettan players Category:Sportspeople from Olomouc Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden Category:Mjällby AIF players Category:FK Drnovice players Category:FC Zbrojovka Brno players Category:Association football midfielders Category:SFC Opava players
title: Pavel Zavadil
